questions.explanation:
Bar & bar.

	Bar billiards, bar code, bar graph etc.

American & american.

	American eagle (another name for bald eagle), American football, American Indian etc.

questions.text: - Apple, - Bertha, - Brother, - dipper, - top, - wheel.
questions.explanation:
Big & big.

	Big Apple, Big Bertha, Big Brother etc.

questions.text: - conditioning, - cushion, - gun, - hostess, - mail, - mile.
questions.explanation:
Air & air.

	Air conditioning, air cushion, air gun etc.

Animal & animal.

	Animal kingdom, animal magnetism and animal rights.

All & all.

	All Black (The international Rugby Union football team of New Zealand), all clear, all fours etc.

questions.text: - doctor, - fish, - officer, - picket, - saucer, - squad.
questions.explanation:
Flying & flying.

	Flying doctor, flying fish, flying officer etc.

Arctic & arctic.

	Arctic Circle, Arctic fox, Arctic Ocean etc.

Action & action.

	Action painting (effects of thrown, smeared, dripped or spattered paint), action replay and action stations.

Belly & belly.

	Belly dance, belly flop, belly laugh etc. Belly landing is the landing of an aircraft on its fuselage without use of its landing gear.

Beauty & beauty.

	Beauty queen, beauty salon, beauty sleep etc.

questions.text: - energy, - number, - power, - structure, - theory, - weight.
questions.explanation:
Atomic & atomic.

	Atomic energy (nuclear energy), atomic number, atomic power etc.

Alpha & alpha.

	Alpha Centauri, alpha particle and alpha ray.

questions.text: - blood, - moon, - Mountains, - murder, - peter, - ribbon.
questions.explanation:
Blue & blue.

	Blue blood, blue moon, blue Mountains etc.

Coconut & coconut.

	Coconut butter, coconut matting, coconut oil etc.

Brass & brass.

	Brass band, brass farthing, brass neck (effrontery, nerve) etc.

Birth & birth.

	Birth certificate, birth control and birth rate.

Angel &Fairy.

	Angel cake, angel dust and Angel Falls.Fairy cake, dust and Falls. Fairy Falls is a small waterfall in New Zealand.

Chain & chain.

	Chain gang, chain letter, chain mail etc.

Bell & bell.

	Bell buoy (navigational buoy fitted with a bell), bell jar , bell tent etc. Bell metal is an alloy of copper and tin used in casting bells.

Chimney & chimney.

	Chimney breast, chimney corner, chimney stack etc.

Box & box.

	Box camera, box elder, box jellyfish etc.

Buzz & buzz.

	Buzz off, buzz saw, and buzz word.

Absolute & absolute.

	Absolute alcohol, absolute majority, absolute zero etc.

Chinese & chinese.

	Chinese chequers, Chinese gooseberry (also called kiwi fruit), Chinese lantern etc. Hope you enjoyed the quiz. If you did, have you played the first three 'Brainstorm' games.
